attributes.additional_details: The Act allows for a regulator to block access to extreme pornographic material in the UK, but has never been brought into force.
attributes.background: The Government should enact Part 3 of The Digital Economy Act. This legislation will allow the regulator to take action against websites which show "extreme" violent and abusive pornography (that normalises violence against women).

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
